parts.text: The `readtext.exe` application ran successfully and outputted "example1".

To compile the executable for Linux, I'll use `dotnet publish` targeting the `linux-x64` runtime. I need to confirm the project file and target framework, which I'll do by examining `readtext.csproj` first.
Okay, I'll compile `readtext.csproj` for Linux. I'll use `dotnet publish -c Release -r linux-x64 --self-contained true -p:PublishSingleFile=true --output bin/Release/net8.0/linux-x64`.

args.command: dotnet publish readtext.csproj -c Release -r linux-x64 --self-contained true -p:PublishSingleFile=true --output bin/Release/net8.0/linux-x64
args.description: Compile the readtext project for Linux x64 runtime as a self-contained single file executable.
